text: Howard Kolls Judson (February 16, 1926 â€“ August 8, 2020) was an American professional baseball player. He was a right-handed pitcher in the Major Leagues from 1948 to 1954. He played for the Chicago White Sox and Cincinnati Redlegs. He was born in Hebron, Illinois. Judson died on August 8, 2020 in Winter Haven, Florida at the age of 95. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Illinois Category:Chicago White Sox players Category:Cincinnati Reds
title: Howie Judson
